duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, as well as execute the food program.
Lead a team of employees/management, recruit, interview, and hire staff, delegate tasks, and follow up on performance.
Monitor and ensure that product areas are stocked, rotated, and displayed to ensure freshness, appeal, and easy customer access.
Ensure all shift sales are completed in accordance with company policies and maintain accurate cash, sales, payroll, and inventory control records.
Oversee the activities of store employees, perform shift supervision, and assume Store Manager responsibilities when needed.
Assist the Store Manager in maintaining a safe environment for employees and customers and protecting company assets.
Prepare or assist in the preparation of periodic sales, product, and operating reports as directed by the Store Manager.
Maintain proper inventory levels and perform duties associated with shift change, such as counting the cash drawer and completing end-of-shift/shift change reports.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
